description:
This modules defines a set of functions for managing persistent, ordered, and updatable collections.

Please refer to our documentation for more information about the lifecycle management and the manipulation of such collections.
authors: <xqdoc:author xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">Matthias Brantner, David Graf, Till Westmann, Markos Zaharioudakis</xqdoc:author>

functions.name: available-collections
functions.description: Gets the QNames of the collections that are available, if any.
functions.summary: Gets the QNames of the collections that are available, if any.

returns.description: A sequence comprising one QName for each available collection or an emtpy sequence if no collections are available.

functions.name: create

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the collection to create.

returns.description: An empty XDM instance and a pending update list that, once applied, creates a collection with the given name.

errors: zerr:ZDDY0002 if a collection with $name already exists.

functions.name: create
functions.description:
Creates a collection and adds the given sequence as content to the new
 collection.
functions.summary: Creates a collection and adds the given sequence as content to the new collection.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the collection to create.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The sequence of items (nodes or JSON items) to be added to the new collection.

returns.description: An empty XDM instance and a pending update list that, once applied, creates a collection with the given name and inserts the given items into it.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">zerr:ZDDY0002 if a collection with the given name already exists.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: delete
functions.description: Deletes the collection having the given name.
functions.summary: Deletes the collection having the given name.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the collection to delete.

returns.description: An empty XDM instance and a pending update list that, once applied, deletes the collection with the given name.

errors: zerr:ZDDY0003 if the collection identified by $name is not available.
zerr:ZDDY0015 if any of the in-scope variables references an item that belongs to the collection with QName $name.

functions.name: is-available-collection
functions.description: Gets whether a collection with the given name is available.
functions.summary: Gets whether a collection with the given name is available.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The QName of the collection that is being checked.

returns.description: true if the collection is available and false otherwise.
